page.title: 08Recreation in N.St Ives.
page.content: Most people in North St.Ives like sports. Even though there are no actual facilities in our D Block, there are two sports centres within walking distance.The Ivo School is one of the centres.At the Ivo there is swimming,tennis ,squash,weightlifting, badminton,bowling,golf,rollerskating dancing,shooting,netball and football.The outdoor complex consists of a track,which is a quarter of a mile,and four or five squash courts. Also when you have worked hard you can go under the shower.Even though most people go to the recreation ground, some people do go to the inside complex.Generally the people of our area are very fortunate as they can play most sports on their own doorstep.
